text: Ronald Maurice Darling Jr. (born August 19, 1960) is an American former right- handed starting pitcher in Major League Baseball (MLB). He played for the New York Mets, Montreal Expos and Oakland Athletics. Darling currently works as a color commentator for national baseball coverage on TBS. He was born in Honolulu, Hawaii. On May 6, 2019, Darling announced that he had been diagnosed with thyroid cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ron Darling at SABR (Baseball BioProject) *Ron Darling at Baseball Gauge *Ron Darling at Ultimate Mets Database *Darling chats about role as Mets analyst (chat transcript) Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:New York Mets players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Sportspeople from Hawaii Category:People from Honolulu
